original_text: Long ago, at the time when King David and Asaph were alive, there had been people to lead the singers. They sang songs to praise God and to thank him. Long ago, at the time when King David and Asaph were alive, there had been people to lead the singers. They sang songs to praise God and to thank him.
korean_text: 옛적 다윗과 아삽의 때에는 노래하는 자의 지도자가 있어서 하나님께 찬송하는 노래와 감사하는 노래를 하였음이며

sentences.original_text: Long ago, at the time when King David and Asaph were alive,
sentences.korean_translation: 오래 전, 다윗 왕과 아삽이 살아 있었던 때에,

sentences.original_text: there had been people to lead the singers.
They sang songs to praise God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님을 찬양하기 위해 노래를 불렀다.

sentences.original_text: Long ago, at the time when King David and Asaph were alive,
sentences.korean_translation: 오래 전, 다윗 왕과 아삽이 살아 있었던 때에,

sentences.original_text: there had been people to lead the singers.
They sang songs to praise God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님을 찬양하기 위해 노래를 불렀다.
